title: University of Seville
description: The university of Seville is currently providing support for the core and the pysat plugins.

title: University of Málaga
description: The university of Malaga is currently providing support for the core and the bdd plugins.

title: University of Graz

title: Universidad Nacional de Educación a Distancia
description: The UNED is currently providing support for the implementation of BDD techniques that cope with colosal feature models.
